mr.robotto.components.comp

Class MrShaderProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • mr.robotto.components.comp.MrComponent
      • mr.robotto.components.comp.MrShaderProgram

  • public class MrShaderProgram
extends MrComponent
    This class represents a Shader Program, it allows to bind a shader program and send data to the GPU
